title: Honkai Impact 3rd - Summer Memories
description:
A series created for the Honkai Impact 3rd Anniversary Event, the Summer Memories Arc lets readers take a closer look into the daily lives of St Freya's Valkyries as they enjoy the sights and sounds of the coastal city of Soukai, bathed in brilliant sunlight as wispy clouds scuddle across the azure sky. No matter whether it's Kiana consulting the great Bishop for culinary advice, or Himeko visiting the Yae Hospital to look for a magical love potion, there's never a dull moment in sight when the girls are serious about having fun!
[hr]Main Story : 
[url=https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3]# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky[/url] 	
[url=https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3]# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall[/url]
